#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<climits>
#include<map>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
#define LL long long
#define P(N) printf("%d\n",N);
#define S(N) scanf("%d",&N);
#define SL(N) scanf("%lld",&N);
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define VI vector<int>
using namespace std;

vector<int>adj[100005];
int noe=0;
int vis[100005]={0};
void dfs(int i)
{
    vis[i]=1;
    int j;
    noe++;
    int l=adj[i].size();
    for(j=0;j<l;j++)
    {
        if(vis[adj[i][j]]==0)//unvisited
            {
                dfs(adj[i][j]);
            }
    }
    return;
}
main()
{
       //   freopen("C:\\Users\\cyber\\Desktop\\codechef\\input.txt", "r", stdin);
      // freopen("C:\\Users\\cyber\\Desktop\\codechef\\output.txt", "w", stdout);
      int test_cases,N,M,x,y,i;
      S(N);S(M);

      while(M--)
      {
          S(x); S(y);
          adj[x].pb(y);
          adj[y].pb(x);
      }
        int con=0;
        LL ans=0;
      for(i=1;i<=N;i++)
      {
          if(!vis[i])
          {
              con++;
              noe=0;
              dfs(i);
             // cout<<" no of nodes= "<<noe<<endl;
              ans+= noe*(N-noe);
          }
      }
      printf("%lld\n",ans/2);

return 0;
}
